2x2 Solver v1.1.1 - Web Streaming Support

Improvements:
- Real-time solution streaming for web (onSolution callback)
- Auto-loading tools.js from CDN (no manual import needed)
- API consistency between Node.js and browser

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed solution array accumulation in streaming mode
- Cleaned up duplicate error handler code

CDN: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/or18/RubiksSolverDemo@2x2-solver-v1.1.1/dist/src/2x2solver/

Backward compatible with v1.1.0 and v1.0.0
